    • onActionAddCustCountryComBx

    • onActionAddCustStateComBx

    • onActionAddCustSaveBtn

      public void onActionAddCustSaveBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      This method handles the logic for adding a customer to the applicaiton. It inserts the data into the database. If there is an error in one of the fields, it will show an error dialog. If the insertion is successful, the scene is changed to ApptCustOverview.fxml
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the save button in the application
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file the code is referencing cannot be found
      SQLException - If there is an error with the SQL query

    • onActionAddCustCancelBtn

      public void onActionAddCustCancelBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method handles the canceling of the add customer action. When it is clicked it changes the scene to ApptCustOverview.fxml
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the cancel button in the application
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file the code is referencing cannot be found
